mapper.insert: insert into project_maintenance (projectName, head, startTime, endTime, status, introduce) values (#{projectName}, #{head}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, #{introduce})
mapper.update: update project_maintenance set projectName = #{projectName}, head = #{head}, startTime = #{startTime}, endTime = #{endTime}, status = #{status}, introduce = #{introduce} where id = #{id}
